author: Jason E. Clapham
description: An after-dinner late night sipper which harnesses rum's character and pairs it with artichoke amaro and a touch of rich cinnamon spice.
name: Fake I.D.
recipeIngredient: 20 ml Cynar or other carciofo amaro

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass
